trans-unit.source: Contains the raw data for a counter.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados brutos de um contador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade retorna uma instância da classe este.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This class provides thread-safe methods for reading and writing counter data.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece métodos de thread-safe para ler e gravar dados do contador.

trans-unit.source: Decrements the counter value by 1.
trans-unit.target: Diminui o contador de valor de 1.

trans-unit.source: This method safely decrements the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse método com segurança diminui o contador de valor para aplicativos multithread.

trans-unit.source: To decrement the counter value by a specific value, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method and set the `value` parameter to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: Para diminuir o valor do contador por um valor específico, chame o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>método e defina o `value` parâmetro para um número negativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o valor do contador, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Increments the counter value by 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor do contador é incrementado em 1.

trans-unit.source: This method safely increments the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse método com segurança incrementa o valor do contador para aplicativos multithread.

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o valor do contador, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value by a specific value, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incrementar o valor do contador por um valor específico, chame o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Increments the counter value by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: O valor do contador é incrementado pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method safely increments the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse método com segurança incrementa o valor do contador para aplicativos multithread.

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o valor do contador, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value by 1, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incrementar o valor do contador em 1, chame o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the counter value.
trans-unit.target: O valor pelo qual incrementar o valor do contador.

trans-unit.source: The increment value can be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: O valor de incremento pode ser positivo ou negativo.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the raw counter data.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém os dados brutos de contador.

trans-unit.source: This property is not thread safe and is appropriate only for single-threaded access.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é thread-safe e só é adequada para acesso de thread único.

trans-unit.source: For multi-threaded access to the counter data, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar vários segmentos de dados do contador, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The raw counter data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados brutos de contador.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the counter data.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém os dados do contador.

trans-unit.source: This property provides safe access to the counter data for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece acesso seguro a dados do contador de aplicativos multithread.

trans-unit.source: If performance is of primary concern, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> property; however, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> property is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Se o desempenho é uma preocupação principal, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>propriedade; no entanto, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>propriedade não é thread-safe.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the Value property is not thread safe in .NET Framework 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a propriedade de valor não é thread-safe no .NET Framework 3.5.

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value, consider using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incrementar o valor do contador, considere o uso de <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The counter data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do contador.
